shows.title: Gentlemen Of Few
shows.desc: They’ve got a banjo, harmonies to die for, they make a souped-up country-folk sound they’ve dubbed Nugrass (Bluegrass is SO 2018), they’re BBC Radio 2 Folk Awards finalists, and we think you’re going to love them. Gentlemen of Few’s fresh faces belie seven years’ hard slog building audiences across the country – including support slots for Hayseed Dixie and The Blockheads.
